summary: THE POWER STEERING STARTED MAKING NOISE WHEN OUR 2001 DODGE GRAND CARAVAN WAS AT ABOUT 50000 MILES.  WE TOOK IT TO 2 PLACES AND BOTH SAID IT WAS THE POWER STEERING.  WE HAD IT REPLACED BUT IT STILL MAKES NOISE, STILL SHUDDERS WHEN GOING LOW SPEEDS, ETC.  WE NOTICED THAT SOMEONE ELSE ON YOUR WEBSITE HAS HAD THE SAME PROBLEM BUT WAS TOLD SINCE IT WAS OUT OF WARRANTY CHRYSLER WOULDN'T FIX IT.  WE AGREE THAT THERE IS A SERIOUS DESIGN DEFECT PROBLEM AND CHRYSLER NEEDS TO RECALL AND FIX IT!  *JB
